channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Branch Sale of the Year: Deals on Office Chairs, Standing Desks, and Home Office Gear
item.description: Branch is offering up to 15 percent off sitewide now through December 3.

item.title: GoWish’s shopping and wish list app is having its biggest year yet
item.description: GoWish, an app for making wish lists, is having a record year, and has doubled its users.

item.title: Washington Post confirms data breach linked to Oracle hacks
item.description: The Washington Post is the latest victim of a hacking campaign by the notorious Clop ransomware gang, which relied on vulnerabilities in Oracle softwa...

item.title: Best Packing Cubes for Every Kind of Trip (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re a no-frills backpacker or a bag-checking fashionista, there’s a perfect packing cube out there for you.

item.title: Seven more families are now suing OpenAI over ChatGPT’s role in suicides, delusions
item.description: In one case, 23-year-old Zane Shamblin had a conversation with ChatGPT that lasted more than four hours.

item.title: Fat Savings on the Super Skinny Razer Blade 14 Gaming Laptop
item.description: You could save hundreds on Razer's sleek gaming laptop with an OLED upgrade.

item.title: The Government Shutdown Is a Ticking Cybersecurity Time Bomb
item.description: Many critical systems are still being maintained, and the cloud provides some security cover. But experts say that any lapses in protections like patc...

item.title: Rivian gives RJ Scaringe a new pay package worth up to $5B
item.description: The company canceled a similar-sized award from 2021, when EV optimism was sky-high, due to the "unlikeliness" that the associated goals could be met.

item.title: WIRED-Approved Brooklinen Bedding Is on Sale for a Few Days
item.description: Upgrade your sleep setup with up to 20 percent off some of our favorite bedding essentials.

item.title: I tried the Apple Crossbody Strap. It’s convenient, but the phone looks silly when the strap is removed.
